name: Chatisfy
description:
CHATISFY is a bot platform that allows you to efficiently manage both customer service and e-commerce business on Facebook Messenger. 

Our user-friendly interface helps beginners to build a chatbot in minutes. Functions, such as keyword auto reply to post and message, and broadcasting, enable you to provide your customer greater user experience.

What makes CHATISFY outstanding is our mature e-commerce system. Our bot platform includes a panel that enables you to build up an online store with full-featured shipping and payment settings. The smooth check-out flow let's your customer to complete an order without leaving our bot. 

After obtaining your subscribers, you can use our analytic dashboard to tag and filter your customers when you plan to do segment marketing or remarketing campaign. Anyone who wants to seize the trend of conversational commerce and close leads can utilize our platform best!
